Vehicle space availability shows an estimate of how much remaining vehicle space is available for a sailing. This estimate doesn't include vehicles outside the terminal waiting to buy a ticket.

Departure

2:23pm Sailing duration: 0h 40m Queen of Coquitlam

Estimated vehicle space available

20%

Total vehicle space available

on the entire ferry

3%

Under height vehicle deck

Only vehicles 7 ft. (2.13 m) high and under (most cars, vans and SUVs).

64%

Mixed vehicle deck

Any vehicle height including those over 7 ft. (2.13 m) high, such as trucks, buses and RVs.

For customer convenience, each vehicle deck has its own estimated percentage of available space. This is particularly important for those with over height vehicles, as they can only fit on the lower vehicle deck. The overall available space is a calculation of the space remaining on both decks as it relates to the entire ferry.
